settings.section_description:
This website is committed to protecting the privacy of its customers. We will never share or sell any personal information, such as name, address, email address, phone number, or payment details. We use secure encryption technology to protect your data and make sure you feel safe when using our services. We also comply with all applicable laws and regulations regarding data protection.

By providing your email address, phone number, or any other personal information through our website, landing pages, or by directly emailing us, you consent to the National Personal Training Academy (NPTA) contacting you via email, phone calls, or text messages for informational, marketing, and promotional purposes. You may withdraw your consent and unsubscribe from these communications at any time by following the instructions provided in the communication or by contacting us directly. Your personal information will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy and Canadian privacy laws, including CASL.

If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us atÂ info@npta.ca.
